about_the_game:
A mysterious force called the “Emoji Virus” has suddenly appeared, which is capable of transforming ordinary emojis into creatures that possess autonomous It was able to transform ordinary emojis into creatures with autonomous consciousness and the ability to attack. These emoji creatures quickly took over all corners of the globe, and humanity was forced into a desperate situation.

You, code name “ManKun”, have become the world's sole survivor. Grab a weapon and eliminate, or escape, the emojis in pursuit!

Unlike traditional games where players are chased by emoticons, this is a game where players can go on a shooting spree and fight bosses.

Players can customize emoticons, sound effects, and kill effects, unlocking all the "HaoTing"!

It takes about 2.66 hours for an average player to achieve all the achievements.

Destroy!

Blocked by an obstacle? Just use the gun to break it up!

Watch out for the Tasho Chainsaw!

Once you touch it, you'll get sucked up into it, oh! Chainsaw~

Game Features

Move to make a series of jumps to get faster, and climb to climb over some obstacles.

The perfect combination of weapons + emoji props + action breaks the traditional concept of horror games.

Go to the store to improve your personal attributes or buy more powerful weapons or throwing props.

Dodge or kill emoticons or escape.

Beware of traps and emoji hounding.

Watch out for turrets and venom, you'll take damage.

Different themed levels to play, record the ranked clearance time records of all the gods (you can pass the evil way).

name: Emoji Puzzle Action - Codename: ManKun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: intel i3-3220 or amd fx-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT730 or equivalent Intel/AMD discrete or integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: intel i5-7600 or amd r5-1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1050 or equivalent AMD discrete graphics card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: In a future transformed by tech, social media and emojis dominate communication. But a disaster strikes when the "Emoji Virus" turns emojis into aggressive beings, overrunning the world. You, "ManKun", the sole survivor and ex-security expert, must now save humanity.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
